definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Is uneasy again to divide, even if sit the contumacy of the heart bottom in uneasy cent also.
sentences.chinese: 再就是不安分，即使坐着也不安分的心底的叛逆性。

sentences.english: Is uneasy again to divide, even if sit the contumacy of the heart bottom in uneasy cent also.
sentences.chinese: 再就是不安分，即使坐着也不安分的心底的叛逆性。

sentences.english: As the roaring rocket rose, the restless roosters rollicked.
sentences.chinese: 呼啸的火箭升空，不安分的公鸡喧闹。

sentences.english: Must you call me, you unquiet one?
sentences.chinese: 难道你一定要呼唤我吗，你这不安分的人？

sentences.english: Mr. Huang, once China's richest man, is known for rocking the boat.
sentences.chinese: 曾一度是中国首富的黄光裕是出了名的不安分人物。

sentences.english: Exactly how naughty were we in our ancestral environment?
sentences.chinese: 我们的祖先在他们的生活圈中究竟有多么的不安分？

sentences.english: As a teen-ager, he began breaking into the place.
sentences.chinese: 青少年时期，他开始不安分了。

sentences.english: Shanda is one of the most disturbed at the company.
sentences.chinese: 盛大是一个最不安分的公司。

sentences.english: She hangs out with a wild crowd.
sentences.chinese: 她经常和一群不安分的人混在一起。

definition: content with one's lot/knowing one's place
unwilling to remain lonely or idle/unwilling to be left out
to begin to stir (idiom)/to get restless/to become threatening
lit. heart like a frisky monkey, mind like a cantering horse (idiom); fig. capricious (derog.)/to have ants in one's pants/hyperactive/adventurous and uncontrollable
to be content with one's lot (idiom)/to know one's place
to disturb/to create confusion/to make a din
